Elita::
 
"I want to see my mommie"whined the little girl
 



To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Thu, 18 Aug 2011 16:51:45=
 -0400
Subject: Re: Returning Home - Changes







Nightshift shows Wing C=
aliber the tracking beacon which flakes a blue light.


" Yup, this blue li=
ght here is the track'n device.  The faster it flashes the closer we are.  =
Right now we're really far from him but according ta this it's taking a Nor=
th by Northwest direction.  Follow this and it will eventually take us ta w=
here he went.  Look, times like these calls for the skills of a Ninjabot.  =
I'm a specially trained special ops Ninja bot officer.  I vote ya let me go=
 on ahead and follow the track and then send for you guys when I get there.=
"


Meanwhile Tucson gives a slow bow of his head as an okay to be met at t=
he med bay.


" All right, yes, I would like that."

Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy. 

On Aug 18, 2011, at 3:26 PM, Super Cyclonus <super=
cyclonus@...> wrote:




  

> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift nudges Wing Calib=
er aside quietly, and hands him a small remote.
>
> " I released a stealth =
micro hover cam when we first encountered Dark
> Rpdimus. It was programmed=
 ta fowllow his IFF signature upon deployment.
> The cam is cloaked but it =
is following him. Just one of many useful tools a
> Ninjabot doesn't go wit=
hout. Here, ya got full interface with the stealth
> cam, and ya got full v=
ideo feed inta the Ark's mainframe. C'mon, let's get
> inside and see how f=
ar that spy cam got."

<NEW>

WING CALIBER nodded, "Now this could be somet=
hing that would be
helpful. Perhaps there will be footgae that could show u=
s where they
are." He looked at the ninja-bot, "I take it the device has a =
beacon
on it so that we can track it when we need to?"

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson =
slowly lumbers off the shuttle on heavy feet, dragging his long tail
> behi=
nd him. He now has just enough energy to walk into the Ark. Rattrap
> and S=
traight Shot are fast to scamper over to him. He looks softly down to
> his=
 sister with a gentile look on his face. Her new form didn't bother him.
>
=
> " I knew that would happen eventually. Remind me not to step on you,
> wo=
uldn't want a foot full of quills."
>
> The tiny porcupine couldn't help bu=
t throw her little paws around her
> brother's neck, with a heart felt hug,=
 keeping her quills down and
> retracted.
>
> " That's for giving it your a=
ll, literally. "
>
> He couldn't help but gently rub his snout on her face,=
 in a show of
> affection. He then looks for Elita and Nightlight.
>
> I mu=
st - see Elita and Nightlight. Their safety is at risk. Can - not let
> Rod=
imus anywhere near them. In fact he - must be barred from the Ark until
> f=
urther notice. If he dares to show his face in this parameter I will not
> =
hesitate to defend the Ark against him. He is our enemy now, and no foe is
=
> allowed anywhere near our territory."

<NEW>

LEGACY walked out of the Ar=
k to assist in the transport of SILVERBOLT,
his single optic turning to gaz=
e at TUSCON, noting his new form.
"Interesting." He said strangely. "Someth=
ing new."

He turned as BUMP and SANTON emerged from the shuttle and began
=
walking towards the ARK.

WING CALIBER turned to TUSCON, "I do not believe =
you are in much shape
to do anything, your systems look critically low." He=
 stepped closer
to TUSCOn as if afraid he would fall. "Perhaps they can mee=
t you in
the medical bay."

(TAG)

Preston
